publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5636.1# Dr Richard Simpson: Family Nurse Partnership Programme in Lothian—As an amendment to motion (S3M-5636) in the name of Ian McKee, after "Parliament" insert "notes the work done by the Prime Minister’s team in 10 Downing Street in analysing and proposing measures to improve parenting and". Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support

S3M-5636.1# Dr Richard Simpson: Family Nurse Partnership Programme in Lothian—As an amendment to motion (S3M-5636) in the name of Ian McKee, after "Parliament" insert "notes the work done by the Prime Minister’s team in 10 Downing Street in analysing and proposing measures to improve parenting and".
